aboutdroidpapers: DroidPapers delivers official stock Android, Chrome and other open source and free wallpapers and ringtones. Download the wallpaper or ringtone you like and set it from within the app. App is and stays ad-free and there are no in-app purchases.
answer1: When a wallpaper is failing to be set as your system wallpaper, the download went probably corrupt. This can happen on occasion, because of network slowdowns or failures. To retry select the option in the menu 'Delete from device' and then re-set the wallpaper again. The cache is deleted so it will trigger a re-download.
answer2: This can happen when filenames are changed. Just un-favorite the broken wallpaper or ringtone or clear the entire application data.
answer3: Content may not be processed into the local database correctly. Try a force download to re-write the content to the database. If that does not help try deleting your cache or reinstalling the app first.
answer4:
In order to provide this feature, the permissions 'WRITE_CONTACTS' and 'READ_CONTACTS' are needed. These permissions are needed for such a feature, but it gives the app implicit permission to access, read and write the entire address-book. For such a simple feature, it is just to much.

There is a work-around though. When you want to set a ringtone as a contact ringtone, do the following. Open the ringtone in DroidPapers. Select 'Download only'. Open your contact in your address-book and select the ringtone from there.
answer5: With the Dynamic Wallpaper service you can let DroidPapers automatically change your wallpaper. A random already downloaded wallpaper will be chosen on a specific time interval. You can choose the interval you desire. An interval of 1 minute roughly takes about 5% of your battery time. The greater the interval, the less usage.
answer6: The Android operating system can stop and restart services when it needs more memory, storage or processing power. When the service restarts the wallpaper gets changed.
answer7: All downloaded wallpapers in the folder: /sdcard/Pictures/DroidPapers. The service does NOT download wallpapers. This to prevent data-usage on mobile networks.
answer8:
All content that is downloaded from within the app is stored on the SD-card, based upon best-practices by Google. See the overview below.

* /sdcard/Pictures/DroidPapers : Wallpapers
* /sdcard/Ringtones/DroidPapers : Ringtone sounds
* /sdcard/Notifications/DroidPapers : Notification sounds
* /sdcard/Alarms/DroidPapers : Alarm sounds
* /sdcard/DroidPapers : Backup files
answer9:
Please try the following steps below.

1. Backup your favorites.
2. Clear app data AND cache.
3. Re-install and re-start app.
4. Download content.
5. Restore your favorites.
6. Re-try, the problems should be gone.
apierror: Webserver API seems offline. Please try again later.
autofilldescription: Always fill screen is an option that always fills the screen with the wallpaper. Depending on the wallpaper, landscape or portrait, either the height or width is being filled, resulting in a wallpaper without black bars.
autofitdescription: Always fit wallpaper is an option that always makes the wallpaper fit entirely on the screen. Depending on the wallpaper, landscape or portrait, either the height or width is being fit to screen. This can result in a wallpaper with black bars on the top and the bottom or on the left and the right side.
autoperformbackupdesc: One backup once per day. Backup is started upon starting the app.
backupfailed: Backup failed. Please try again or contact the developer.
checkmuzeiextension: Check out the Muzei Live Wallpaper Extension for DroidPapers.
deletecachemessage:
Do you want to delete the entire cache?

Thumb images and promotion messages will be reset. Application settings, and downloaded wallpapers and ringtones will not be deleted.

The app will exit after this operation.
deletedownloadsdesc: This will delete all downloaded wallpapers and ringtones.
deletedownloadsmessage:
Do you want to delete all downloaded wallpapers and ringtones?

This cannot be undone!
deleteentirecachedesc: This will not delete downloaded wallpapers, ringtones and specific app settings.
disablenotifyappupdate: Disabled notify on app updates service.
disclaimertext: All content and rights belong to their respected owners. No transfer of ownership is at hand with using this application. Every wallpaper and ringtone that is included in this app/website is downloaded from the Internet. There is no copyright violation intended with this app. If you feel that your copyright has been violated, please get in touch. Appropriate actions will be taken.
downloadbusywallnotes: Writing wallpaper notes to database started
downloadrequiredcontentdownload:
You need to start the download in order to see content in DroidPapers.

The download will only take a minute.
dynamicdescription: Dynamic Wallpaper is a service that automatically changes your wallpaper on set intervals. Only already downloaded wallpapers are being used.
enablenotifyappupdate: Enabled notify on app updates service.
enableordisabledynamic: Enable or disable the Dynamic Wallpaper.
excludecamerafolder: Exclude Camera folder with Dynamic Wallpaper.
excludedroidpapersfolder: Exclude DroidPapers folder with Dynamic Wallpaper.
excludedroidpapersfolderdesc: Exclude downloaded DroidPapers wallpapers from the random selection. This setting only works when the Picture and/or Camera folder is included.
excludepicturesfolder: Exclude Pictures folder with Dynamic Wallpaper.
howdroidpapersisbuild:
DroidPapers is build in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery Mobile. PhoneGap is used to create a native app of the web-code.

Read more about this here: About DroidPapers.
includecamerafolder: Include Camera folder with Dynamic Wallpaper.
includecamerafolderdesc: The folder where the camera pictures are stored is included in the random wallpaper selection.
includedroidpapersfolder: Include DroidPapers folder with Dynamic Wallpaper.
includepicturesfolder: Include Pictures folder with Dynamic Wallpaper.
includepicturesfolderdesc: The folder /sdcard/Pictures is included in the random wallpaper selection.
infoaboutsettingwalldesc: You can set a wallpaper with two different options. One is to fill the entire screen with wallpaper, and the other to fit the entire wallpaper on the screen. Below you can see what it means.
internetneededfordownload: You need a connection with internet to start the download.
localcontentalreadylatest:
Local content is already the latest version. You can download the content again if required.

The download will only take a minute.
morequestionstext: Just press one of the buttons below and ask your question. Don't forget to include the system info below.
newcontentavailabledownload:
New content for DroidPapers is available.

The download will only take a minute.

Notes
nodensitywallpapers: No wallpapers in database that has the selected densities.
nodistroselected: No distribution is selected. Please select a distribution.
nofavoriteringtones: You do not have any favorite (starred) ringtones selected.
nofavoritewallpapers: You do not have any favorite (starred) wallpapers selected.
nofileornowebserver: File does not exists or cannot connect to webserver, please try again or contact the developer.
norecentringtones: No ringtones in database found that are recently added.
norecentwallpapers: No wallpapers in database found that are recently added.
noringfoundswithquery: No ringtones in database found that matches the search query.
noringtonesfordistribution: No ringtones in database for selected distribution.
nosearchquery: No search query specified. Please specify a search query.
notifynewappdesc: Once a day and once per update.
notifynewcontentdesc: Once a day and once per update.
nowallfoundswithquery: No wallpapers in database found that matches your search query.
nowallpapermatchfilter: No wallpapers that matches the filters are found in database for the selected distribution.
nowifi: No WiFi Internet connection detected. Auto load of online content on app launch is therefore disabled to prevent data-usage on mobile-networks. Tap refresh icon in the action bar above to load the content.
optionssetcolorwallpaper: Options how to set the color of the wallpaper.
optionssetsizewallpaper: Options how to set the size of the wallpaper.
pleaseratethisapp: Please rate this app if you like DroidPapers.
pleaseselectatopic: Please select a topic to see more.
privacytext: This app does not collect any private or personal identifiable information, nor sends any such information to online servers. App statistics are, if switched on, uploaded to generate information for the improvement of the app. App statistics are completely anonymous and only contains general information about how the app is used.
